introduction.headline: Developing Multinational Organizations Through Excellence
introduction.summary: Tofazzal Hossain Bhuiyan is an experienced executive with a demonstrated history of developing a multinational organization from its launch in Bangladesh. With 23+ years at Servier, he brings expertise in comprehensive company management backed by an MBA, combining domestic and global exposure with passion for change and excellence.
introduction.mission: With a vision of tomorrow, thriving to become a good leader and to make positive impact in the lives of others.
